attributes.review: This app is honestly dumb and made me break out in hives. The UI is dumb and trump is dumb and this app needs to go. All the information on this app is #fakenews and we should not have an app for a sexual assaulter/racist/xenophobe to project his platform.
attributes.title: This app gave me migraines

attributes.review: some friend of mine told me to get this app to see if it works. so i got it. its suppose to be for updates on news or something. it glitches out and lags instead. theres no point of having this useless app. twitter gives more info on everything and is lit. this app is trash. why was it even created?? please remove. there’s better apps out there.
attributes.title: twitter is better

attributes.review: I got this app of hopes to keep me updated with the campaign. Time after time the app keeps crashing. It is a poorly functioning app. One of the worst apps I’ve used.
attributes.title: Bugs
